scripts.pinstall: for f in $PWD/{.,assert,reporters,zora,pta}; do cd $f && npm i; done;
scripts.build: for f in $PWD/{reporters,zora}; do cd $f && npm run build; done;
scripts.clean:install: npm run clean && npm run pinstall && npm run build
scripts.test: for f in $PWD/{assert,reporters,zora,pta}; do cd $f && npm t; done;
